vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.8;
son of: Hur (H1133H)
§ Ben-hur = "son of whiteness" or "son of Chur"
a man who was commissariat officer for Solomon in Mount Ephraim
vocabinfos._es_Definition: funcionario; en tiempos del rey Salomón
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
便-戶珥 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "見證之子" 或 "戶珥(Chur)之子"
所羅門王的一位後勤官, 在以法蓮山區負責供應王室的所需 (王上4:8)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
便-户珥 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "见证之子" 或 "户珥(Chur)之子"
所罗门王的一位后勤官, 在以法莲山区负责供应王室的所需 (王上4:8)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ki.4.8;
father of: Ben-hur (H1133)
§ Ben-hur = "son of whiteness" or "son of Chur"
a man who was commissariat officer for Solomon in Mount Ephraim
